mekarunata drushtantha kota dakwimata, dhammapadaye ena mul ma yamakaya wuwath pramanawath ya.mano pubbangama dhamma mano setta manomaya manasa che paduttena hasathi wa karothi wathatho nan dukkhamanwethi chakkanwa wahatho padan mano pubbangama dhamma manosetta manomayamanasa che pasannena hasathi wa karothi wa thatho nan sukhamanwethi chayawa anapayinime ramaniya padya yugalaya meparidden apa basata nanga dakwiya hakke ya.siyalu dahamata sitha peratu we sitha ma mul we, sithin sidu we pawitu sithakin yamak kiwoth pawitu sithakin yamak kalahoth duka ya, ohu anuwa ma adenne gonaku anuwa yana gal sakak se siyalu dahamata sitha peratu wesitha ma mul we.
